details: The scheme "Family Pension" by the Bihar Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (BBOCWWB), Labour Resources Department, Government of Bihar, provides pension to the dependent of the deceased pensioner of the Board.
benefits: 50% of the pension amount or ₹100/-, whichever is higher.
eligibility: The applicant should be a dependent of a deceased worker.
The worker, in his/her lifetime, should have been registered with the "Bihar Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board".
The worker, in his/her lifetime, should have been in receipt of regular pension from the Board.
application_process: Step 1: Visit the Official Website of the "Bihar Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board".
Step 3: Enter your registration number and click "Show" to view your details.
Step 4: Select the scheme you intend to apply for, enter all mandatory information and upload the necessary documents in the specified format and size.
Step 6: Click on "Submit Application" to complete the process.
Application Tracking: Applicants can track their application status online on the official website of the Board by providing their registration number.
documents_required: Identity Proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter Card
Proof of age at the time of Registration
Identity Card of the Registered Worker
